sentence.Network_en: A woman regarded as slovenly or untidy; a slattern.
sentence.Network_cn: 懒婆娘,邋遢女人懒散或不整洁的女人; 衣着不整的女人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... slating 批评 slattern 随便的女人 slatternly 不检点的.
高级英语第一册 12.The Loons_在线英语听力室 ... perturb 使不安；烦扰 slattern 邋遢女人；懒女人 neon 氖.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... slovenly adj． 不整洁的，马虎的 slattern adj 不整洁的 | tatty adj 不整洁的，简陋的.
毛姆奖_百度百科 ... The Testimony of Taliesin Jones 琼斯见证塔利辛 Slattern 懒妇（slattern） Kitchen Venom 厨房蛇毒.

list.abs: 2009年1月2日 -  ぶす homely slattern 丑女人 はぬけのさむらい toothless samurai 老掉牙的武士 でぶでぶ、ぶよぶよ 肥猪 にきびだらけの颜.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: related to slattering 'slovenly', from dialect slatter 'to spill, slop', frequentative of slat 'strike', of unknown origin

entry.def: A slattern is a dirty untidy woman.

means.word_mean: 1. a prostitute who attracts customers by walking the streets

auth_sentence.content: She was a terrible slattern. Her house was always in a mess.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was a terrible slattern. Her house was always in a mess.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was a terrible slattern. Her house was always in a mess.
